obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_163_0: \E2* Are you ready to ROCK HARD!?/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_219_0: * That's right^1! Get out your lighters for the LIGHTNERS^1, ladies and germs!/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_220_0: * Because it's time for a crashing^1, banging^1, booming^1, crooning.../
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_242_0: * Oh^1, Kris^1! Remember DECEMBER? Oh^1, that little musical prodigy.../
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_243_0: * Remember when she'd grab the remote and swap it from cartoons.../
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_244_0: * ..^1. to that WILD music video channel Toriel FORBID you to see?/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_281_0: * Dess^1, rocking her guitar and singing along with those nasty^1, nasty songs!/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_282_0: * Didn't you all think she was just so..^1. COOL?/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_283_0: * HECK^1! Maybe you could get her to come back and watch again sometime!?/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_319_0: * No worries^1! It's so SIMPLE^1, a FAX MACHINE could do it!/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_321_0: * When the MUSIC starts^1, notes will flow from the top like HONEY./%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_555_0: * When the NOTES hit the MARK^1, press with good timing to PLAY them^1!/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_556_0: * ~1 (or ~2) will play notes on the LEFT!/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_557_0: * ~1 (or ~2) will play notes on the RIGHT!/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_558_0: * Make sure to HOLD the button for those LONG NOTES!/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_559_0: * Got it^1, Kris?^1! Good^1! That's all you gotta know!/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_326_0: * SUSIE and RALSEI will be doing their own things^1, so IGNORE THEIR PARTS./%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_327_0: * That being said^1, MUSIC is a TEAM SPORT^1! If ANY of you play bad.../%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_328_0: * The POPU `& LARITY LIGHTS will darken^1^1! And if they go black.../%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_330_0: * NOW^1, how about a SOUND CHECK!? This one's just for practice!/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_369_0: \E7* Hey^1, we make a pretty good band./
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_372_0: \EN* (Kris^1, the two of us will need to play perfectly...)/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_694_0: \EK* Hey^1, Kris^1, way to make us fail the song./
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_696_0: \EK* (I'll..^1. just try to sing as loud as I can...)/%
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_387_0: * ALRIGHT^1! SOUND: Checked^1! DRUMS: Loud^1! BOYS: Fluffy!/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_390_0: \ED* Umm^1, they seem a little..^1. inappropriate. Do I have to...?/
obj_ch3_GSB02_slash_Step_0_gml_392_0: * TOO BAD^1! NOW^1, AUDIENCE^1! Give it up one last time.../%
